attributes.action: be present when every dead british soldier is returned from conflict overseas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We must insist that the current Prime Minisiter is present when our troops who have been killed in action overseas are returned home.  If a govenment can send them to die for their country then they can be there when they come home.  This is a request for some resepect and dignity for our brave troops.
